articles.author: Aakash Saini
articles.title: Virat Kohli's Old Tweet For Aiden Markram Goes Viral After South African Hits Fastest WC Ton - OneCricket
articles.description: South African batsman Aiden Markram blasted a boundary-laden 106 against Sri Lanka in their opening World Cup 2023 fixture at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi.
articles.content:
Aiden Markram celebrates his century at the 2023 World Cup (x.com)
Aiden Markram bludgeoned 106 scorching runs from just 54 balls to orchestrate a big South African win over Sri Lanka in their openi… [+1530 chars]
